title: Science Knowledge-Building Community Through Dual Authenticity Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic science concepts and research methodologies
context.additional_context: A learner-centered environment where professionals investigate work-related scientific topics with asynchronous collaboration via digital devices

learning_goals: Learners can produce at least five integrated inquiry questions that combine professional identity and personal interests in scientific problem-solving using the HKBC framework
Learners can sustain knowledge-building activities with peer learners via collaborative tools and digital platforms for over 8 weeks, exchanging feedback at least twice weekly
Learners can analyze cognitive and emotional changes during learning through reflective journals based on the ENDURE framework and submit a final report (approximately 3,000 characters)
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
